meanings.definition: A platform or step at the base of an altarpiece.
meanings.sent1: The predellas provided a sturdy base for the beautiful altarpiece.
meanings.sent2: The intricate designs on the predellas added to the grandeur of the altarpiece.
meanings.sent3: The mice decided to have a dance party on the predellas of the altarpiece.
meanings.sent4: The predellas were like the foundation of a majestic castle, holding up the altarpiece.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming onto the predellas made them gleam like polished marble.

meanings.definition: The lower part of an altarpiece, often decorated with scenes or images.
meanings.sent1: The predellas displayed scenes from biblical stories in vivid colors.
meanings.sent2: People admired the detailed paintings on the predellas of the altarpiece.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the predellas and chirped along with the choir.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like the images on the predellas, full of beauty and mystery.
meanings.sent5: The predellas seemed to come alive, telling stories of faith and devotion.
